devcard.name: devCard
devcard.desc: Only one person has this card, and it belongs to the dev himself >:)

pancakes.name: Pancakes
pancakes.desc: yummy pancakes drizzled with honey mmmmmm
usage: You ate some pancakes, and the pancakes were good

royaljelly.name: Royal Jelly
royaljelly.desc: Each one used gives you a 0.5% multiplier (limit is 50, for a 25% multi bonus)
usage: You drank some royal jelly, and now feel empowered with a +0.5% multiplier!

prayerbeads.name: Prayer Beads
prayerbeads.desc: Protects the wearer once by lowering the effect of ghostly punishment
usage: This item can't be used, since merely carrying it gives you it's effect
